code: protected Endpoint createEndpoint(String uri, String remaining, Map<String, Object> parameters) throws Exception {     final WordpressComponentConfiguration endpointConfiguration = this.copyComponentProperties().     WordpressEndpoint endpoint = new WordpressEndpoint(uri, this, endpointConfiguration).     setProperties(endpoint, parameters).     this.discoverOperations(endpoint, remaining).     endpoint.configureProperties(parameters).     return endpoint. }

private void discoverOperations(WordpressEndpoint endpoint, String remaining) {     final String[] operations = remaining.split(OP_SEPARATOR).     endpoint.setOperation(operations[0]).     if (operations.length > 1) {         endpoint.setOperationDetail(operations[1]).     } }

private WordpressComponentConfiguration copyComponentProperties() throws Exception {     Map<String, Object> componentProperties = new HashMap<>().     IntrospectionSupport.getProperties(configuration, componentProperties, null, false).     // create endpoint configuration with component properties     WordpressComponentConfiguration config = new WordpressComponentConfiguration().     IntrospectionSupport.setProperties(config, componentProperties).     return config. }
